snippet: Former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez has appeared in court in Boston as a judge met with attorneys to prepare for his upcoming trial in the 2012 shooting deaths of two men....
lead_paragraph: Former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez has appeared in court in Boston as a judge met with attorneys to prepare for his upcoming trial in the 2012 shooting deaths of two men.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez in Court for 2012 Drive-By Shootings
headline.print_headline: Aaron Hernandez in Court for 2012 Drive-By Shootings
